articles.author: Rohan Nadkarni
articles.title: Pacers defeat Knicks in 6 games, advance to NBA Finals to face Thunder - NBC News
articles.description: The Indiana Pacers advanced to the NBA Finals on Saturday, defeating the New York Knicks 125-108 in Game 6 of their conference finals matchup.
articles.content:
The Indiana Pacers advanced to the NBA Finals on Saturday, defeating the New York Knicks 125-108 in Game 6 of their conference finals matchup.
